Name: Google Spotlight Stories: On Ice
About the game: “On Ice” tells the story of an over-the-top, sci-fi themed ice show and its star, who suddenly finds he has competition for the spotlight from an unlikely rival. Directed by Emmy Award winning artist Shannon Tindle and produced at Evil Eye Pictures.
